highlights.bullet: The Firm's Chief Executive Officer, James Dimon, adopted a Rule 10b5-1 trading arrangement on November 7, 2024, to sell 1,000,000 shares of the Firm's stock between November 7, 2024, and August 1, 2025.
The Firm holds $861 million in High-Quality Liquid Assets (HQLA) as of December 31, 2024, which is sufficient to meet its estimated total net cash outflows over a 30-day period of significant stress.
